thread.title: Photos: Aurora borealis visible across Northwest Arkansas & the River Valley
thread.title_full: Photos: Aurora borealis visible across Northwest Arkansas & the River Valley

author: xda-developers.com
title: Photos: Aurora borealis visible across Northwest Arkansas & the River Valley
text: Here are some of the photos you shared of Thursday night's aurora borealis Advertisement Here are some of the photos you shared of Thursday night's aurora borealis FAYETTEVILLE, Ark. â€” A geomagnetic storm brought aurora borealis down to Northwest Arkansas and the River Valley Thursday night. Like Chief Meteorologist Darby Bybee explained, the Northern Lights are caused by coronal mass ejections, or energy coming from the sun. Thursday night's geomagnetic storm was particularly intense. [Many people in Northwest Arkansas were also able to see the Northern Lights in May.](https://www.4029tv.com/article/northern-lights-northwest-arkansas-aurora-borealis-geomagnetic-storm-2024/60762011) Here are the pictures viewers shared with 40/29 from across Arkansas and Oklahoma.
